entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.0°C

Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 77 %

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
